mapper.select: select a.* , t2.ProjectName as ProjectIDLinkText, t5.TeamName as TeamIDLinkText, t6.real_name as CreateUserIDLinkText, t7.dict_label as StatusLinkText from ach_tech a left join Aud_Project t2 on a.ProjectID = t2.ProjectID left join PM_Team t5 on a.TeamID = t5.TeamID join sys_user t6 on a.CreateUserID = t6.user_id left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type='科技成果状态') t7 on a.Status = t7.dict_value where a.TechID = #{techid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update ACH_Tech set TechName = #{techname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TechYear = #{techyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IfFirst = #{iffirst,jdbcType=BIT}, KeyPoint = #{keypoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Performance = #{performance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProjectID = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TeamID = #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateUserID = #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where TechID = #{techid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select TechID, TechName, TechYear, IfFirst, KeyPoint, Performance, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status from ACH_Tech where TechID = #{techid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select TechID, TechName, TechYear, IfFirst, KeyPoint, Performance, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status from ACH_Tech
